Keywords: Armor , Excalibur , Mystical
Real Name: Brian Braddock
Special Powers
LE FAY'S BLESSING: Battle Fury. Dark Britain can reduce penetrating damage.
TAKE THE TRINKET, I BEG THEE…PLEASE: When Dark Britain is KO'd, choose a friendly character. For the rest of the game that character can use [Wing symbol], Toughness, Willpower, and Super Strength.
SLAY THE PRETENDER: Charge, Flurry, [Improved Movement: Hindering].
DIE, WITCHBREED: Blades/Claws/Fangs. // When Dark Britain hits, after resolutions choose one: remove an action token from him -or- heal 1 click. If the target has the X-Men keyword, choose both.

Pulled this guy back when the set dropped. Coming back to comment because he's an absolute monster post rule change. He just has so much value packed into his point value. I field him successfully as a bodyguard on Mystical teams all the time.
